title: New: Peaking Lights – LO HI
content:
Last year’s surprise package Peaking Lights return with their first new material of 2012 with the psychedelic LO HI.

Featuring ‘vocal’ samples from Mikko, the baby boy of the duo (oh no they’ve gone all Blue Ivy on us), LO HI is also the first single to be taken from their forthcoming record entitled Lucifer out 18 June on Mexican Summer. It’s a slightly disjointed journey through the ever-changing world of Peaking Lights, combining their previous sounds with a denser, more all encompassing atmosphere. Check out LO HI below and head here for more information on Lucifer.

Via Pitchfork
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
